resources.string: Call Guardian
Call Guardian needs call screening access to analyze and block spam calls.
Call Guardian needs to be the default SMS app to scan and manage messages.
Lookup Results
Shows caller lookup information with quick actions.

Contacts permission is required to access your contacts and improve lookup results.
Phone state permission is required for call screening functionality.
Call permission is required to make phone calls.
SMS permission is required to read and analyze messages.
Contacts write permission is required to update contact information.
Phone state permission is required to access call information.
Call log permission is required to access call history.
Call log permission is required to update call history.
Outgoing calls permission is required to process outgoing calls.
External storage permission is required to access files.
External storage permission is required to save files.
Camera permission is required to take photos.
Audio recording permission is required to record audio.
Location permission is required to access precise location.
Location permission is required to access approximate location.
Vibration permission is required to provide haptic feedback.
Wake lock permission is required to keep the device awake during operations.
Internet permission is required to access online services.
Network state permission is required to check network connectivity.
Wi-Fi state permission is required to check Wi-Fi connectivity.
Network state permission is required to change network settings.
Wi-Fi state permission is required to change Wi-Fi settings.
Location extra commands permission is required for advanced location features.
Mock location permission is required for location testing.
Shortcut installation permission is required to create shortcuts.
Shortcut uninstallation permission is required to remove shortcuts.
Bluetooth permission is required to access Bluetooth devices.
Bluetooth admin permission is required to manage Bluetooth settings.
NFC permission is required to access NFC features.
Sync settings permission is required to read sync settings.
Sync settings permission is required to write sync settings.
Sync stats permission is required to read sync statistics.
Status bar expansion permission is required to expand the status bar.
Sticky broadcast permission is required to send sticky broadcasts.
Surface flinger access permission is required for advanced graphics features.
Unread contacts permission is required to read unread contacts.
Unread contacts permission is required to write unread contacts.
Profile permission is required to read user profile.
Profile permission is required to write user profile.
User dictionary permission is required to read user dictionary.
User dictionary permission is required to write user dictionary.
Social stream permission is required to read social stream.
Social stream permission is required to write social stream.
Calendar permission is required to read calendar events.
Calendar permission is required to write calendar events.
Contacts permission is required to read contacts.
SMS permission is required to write messages.
SMS receive permission is required to receive messages.
SMS send permission is required to send messages.
MMS receive permission is required to receive MMS messages.
WAP push receive permission is required to receive WAP push messages.
